dmca.title: Abuse complaint regarding the server located at [209.85.53.162] 123mycodes.com Case N
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Shannon Hicks [mailto:shan@iotashan.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, October 04, 2006 3:49 PM
Posted To: DMCA Houston
Conversation: Abuse complaint regarding the server located at
[209.85.53.162] 123mycodes.com Case Number: 10025
Subject: RE: Abuse complaint regarding the server located at
[209.85.53.162] 123mycodes.com Case Number: 10025


Removing one of several pages that link to the copyrighted files does
NOT satisfy a DMCA notice. You must remove all files, not just one of
the HTML pages that link to them.

The files in question seem to all be in these directories:

http://www.123mycodes.com/myspacecursors/file/
http://www.123mycodes.com/myspacecursors/preview/

I will await you further action and response.

Also, how many more times does your client get to just re-upload the
same files before you just shut down their account?


Shannon Hicks

-----Original Message-----
From: Everyones Internet DMCA Agent [mailto:dmca@ev1.net]
Sent: Wednesday, October 04, 2006 3:40 PM
To: shan@iotashan.com
Subject: Abuse complaint regarding the server located at [209.85.53.162]
123mycodes.com Case Number: 10025

Your Reference Number: 123mycodes.com
Our Case Number: 10025


Sir, 

We feel that the user in question in this violation has successfully
removed the material in question regarding the abuse complaint and have
closed the case in our records, as of 10/4/2006 3:39:34 PM. 

The offending URL(S) was:  http://www.123mycodes.com/custom-cursor.php.
If you have any questions, please contact us at chrisn@ev1servers.net
and
abuse@ev1servers.net.   Referencing 10025

-- 

Regards,
Abuse Team
EV1Servers.net
abuse@ev1servers.net

--
